actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to transfer the National Institute of Mental Health to the National Institutes of Health.
short_title: National Institute of Mental Health Transfer Act of 1985
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: National Institute of Mental Health Transfer Act of 1985 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to make the National Institute of Mental Health a division of the National Institutes of Health (currently it is within the Alcohol, Drug Abuse, and Mental Health Administration).

titles.title: National Institute of Mental Health Transfer Act of 1985
A bill to transfer the National Institute of Mental Health to the National Institutes of Health.
